recipesJson.name: Better Than Mothers Milk by Enyawreklaw Diy or Die
recipesJson.author: Ant6666
recipesJson.description: I couldn't find this on ATF and wanted to mix it up so thought I'd share. All credit to Wayne at DoD for this recip. Find it here https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Wc-kNTLH0-c&t=38s

reviews.text:
After 1 month it seems to smooth out very nicely. 
Deliciously balanced.
I let it steep for 8 days. It's delicious and easy to mix but I can't ADV it. Thanks for sharing :)
This tastes amazing and is pretty easy to make! Thanks again Wayne!
Two week steep for best results.
